ObsSpectrum¶

class misfit.ObsSpectrum(**kwargs)[source]¶

Bases: misfit.Spectrum

Class to hold observed spectra.
self.wave holds the observed wavelength array.
Input:
band: spectrum band name slit_PA: slit PA (parallel to slit) CCW relative to North (North = 0deg, East=90deg)
